html:
9.5.20  5:01 pm   Do you have any artists that you could consider inspiration for the style of music you make, and if so, who?

      all of them, but the biggest inspiration is just the natural limitations of time and space

9.5.20  4:41 pm   What should I put on my waffles?

      a flag

9.5.20  4:14 pm   how do you balance learning a new skill or technology with creating stuff?

     i have no earthly idea

      i want to branch out my musical toolbox but feel like it bogs me down from actually making music

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

9.5.20  3:53 pm   Why does your spotify bio say "sumic"? 

      that is my job description, but with the letters re-arranged for some spice

9.5.20  3:28 pm   what do i do if I don't know who i am and don't know what makes me happy

      write a folk tale

9.5.20  3:08 pm   Had trouble finding inspiration and will to make music recently. Any tips?

      don't do it

9.5.20  1:45 pm   How to be good at existing?

      i have no earthly idea

9.5.20  1:06 pm   How do you start a war?

      put pineapples on a pizza

9.5.20  12:58 pm   will the new song be 135 or 180 bars long?

      135

9.5.20  12:48 pm   are we living in a stimulation?

      yes that's exactly what it is

9.5.20  11:58 am   what's your favorite type of water

      wet blast

9.5.20  11:50 am   What are your thoughts on classical music? 

      whatever it takes, to get the job done

9.5.20  10:54 am   Thoughts on spain?

      it's good

9.5.20  10:53 am   How do you escape the world

      you can actually escape the world by staying in it. the world escapes itself, and you can go along for the ride

9.5.20  10:11 am   Do you think anyones dreams can come true?

      yes but that's only part of the picture

9.5.20  9:04 am   Will we ever know everything 

      yes but then there will immediately be more new things

9.5.20  8:38 am   What your favor song that you made?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

     Mines "the moon's made of cheese"

9.5.20  7:30 am   Do you like cookies?

      am cookie

9.5.20  6:08 am   What do you think when you hear swear words? 

      i have never heard a swear word

9.5.20  4:48 am   How can i use the major scale in a way that doesn't sound silly? 

      try the bass in some non-1 places

9.5.20  3:42 am   Thoughts on Jesus?

      friendly, has good intentions probably,

9.5.20  3:27 am   What was before BIG BANG?

      a series of ordinary bangs

9.5.20  2:54 am   What's the wrong way to eat breakfast?

      i know there is one but i can't think of it

9.5.20  2:20 am   I want to learn guitar but cant get into it. Any tips?

      just learn all the chords

9.5.20  1:46 am   How many chords can you play on guitar?

      maybe about 1000

9.5.20  1:37 am   Opinion on oranges?

      they are round and i can prove it

9.5.20  1:36 am   If I were to take a peek in le dumpsteur, what would I find?

      trashe

9.5.20  1:32 am   How do you feel about the viola

      confused. i actually don't know what size it is

9.5.20  1:15 am   hey bill big fan of yourself. how the heck did you get into music and music theory to begin with?

      all you need is any device which behaves at least somewhat like a musical instrument. after that it's just the same as learning your way around a room. just go to the room and hang out there for a while

9.5.20  1:10 am   can we have more music plz

      sure

9.5.20  12:17 am   Do you ever feel like a plastic bag?

      no

9.5.20  12:15 am   How to grow hair?

      impossible. it can't be done

9.5.20  12:13 am   how do i cure hiccups

      newer, better hiccups

9.4.20  11:59 pm   hey your song i'm Best Friends with my Own Front Door makes me feel warm and hopeful when my brain and heart are ready to quit. i am wondering, what is the wonderful powerful magic going on in the transitions at the moments "time to win some awards" (feels very rhythmically satisfying?) and also "so I'm leaving / oh there's my balloon" ? those moments especially make my heart go AaaaAAHH!!! (in a good way) and i want to know what the secret is.

     i think the secret is to say things are not so good, and then, as a surprise, say things are getting better

     thanks for everything, can't wait to hear the new stuff :)

9.4.20  11:47 pm   are you planning on a schedule for your videos

      yes

9.4.20  11:31 pm   Teach me music theory

      it's your job to make a theory. and don't be alarmed when the theory bursts into flames. this is normal, and expected

9.4.20  11:30 pm   Have you ever used the word administrator in a song,

     not yet

      if so which one?

9.4.20  11:16 pm   why do you make videos

      someone's gotta do it

9.4.20  11:11 pm   What do you do for fun?

      try to illustrate the world i live in in various ways

9.4.20  11:06 pm   What is your favorite key to improv in; also your favorite key to make songs in

      it doesn't matter

9.4.20  10:43 pm   have these questions ever influenced your songwriting?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.4.20  10:27 pm   You always tell people to write bad music and the good music will come. So how do you write good bad music? 

      i have no idea. the good part writes itself. you are supposed to provoke it by writing the bad parts

9.4.20  10:19 pm   Do you often say stuff like "i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite" or "the scientific community is offering a massive prize reward to anyone who can figure it out" or "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes" in real life, when talking to people?

      yes, if it makes sense in context

9.4.20  10:10 pm   what does the whisper say in sexy pants

      this

9.4.20  10:05 pm   will the world ever run out of new melodic phrases? 

      no

9.4.20  9:35 pm   How do you know when you get to the grown up part of 'what do you want to be when you grow up'?

      when you are what you wanted to be

9.4.20  9:18 pm   why am i on earth

      to make it better

9.4.20  9:01 pm   what is the point of watering cans if watering cans are not watering cans 

      makes you think

9.4.20  8:50 pm   are you still too small for the mall?

      what the heck is a mall

9.4.20  8:32 pm   I like writing, but I don't like what we learn and do in English class, is this an indication that I may not be cut out for writing. 

      no. writing is an invitation into your own world. an english class might forget to respect that fully, and accidentally try to steer you into various past worlds
